instruction: In the given scenario, predict the probability of the person suffering from Diabetes.
input: Person aged 58, smokes 30 cigarettes a day, drinks alcohol, overweight
output: The probability of the person suffering from Diabetes is high. Smoking elevates the risk of type 2 diabetes. Heavy alcohol consumption can also increase the risk. Being overweight also increases the risk of type 2 diabetes significantly. Therefore, the probability of them having diabetes is high.
